description: A rare material from the Bell-Borne Geochelone, which only resonates at a specific frequency. It's said that in the hands of a skilled apothecary, it can be refined into a miraculous medicine.
bgDescription: A rare material from the Bell-Borne Geochelone, which only appears in a specific frequency. It's said that in the hands of a skilled pharmacist, it can be crafted into a miraculous medicine.
